text: is a Japanese former cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit at the 1992 Summer Olympics. He later became a teacher and coach at a high school in Fukushima Prefecture. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Japan Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Fukushima Prefecture Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan Category:Cyclists at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games
title: Makio Madarame
